column15: Buy original Symphony Instant Water Geyser at best price in India. Read its features  reviews and specifications. Get fast & assured delivery all over India.
column17:
Symphony Instant Water Geyser
This premium quality instant water geyser from Symphony is perfect to serve your needs of hot water in kitchen. It is known for its energy-efficiency reliable performance and long life. It has rust-proof and shock-proof thermoplastic body with imported capillary thermostat for thermal cut out.
Key Features of Symphony Instatnt Geyser ESS1

  • Rust proof Shock proof thermoplastic body
  • Compact sized
  • Heavy guage tank
  • Whirl flow mechanism
  • Dual Insulation
  • Energy efficient heating element
  • Imported Capillary thermostat Thermal Cutout
  • Temperature Control Panel
  • 5 year tank warranty* & 2 year Product warranty
  • *Conditions apply
  • *Features may vary from model to model
